name: js-test-driven-learning
description: tutorial and discussion about using oop features and designs in js

scripts.docs: cat docs/header.html > docs/index.html && mocha tutorials/index --reporter doc >> docs/index.html && cat docs/footer.html >> docs/index.html
scripts.md: mocha tutorials/index.js --reporter ../../../lib/mocha-reporter-md.js > tmp.md && marked -f tmp.md -o tmp.html

author: Osher
